# graylog_event_definition (Data Source)

Fetches information about a specific Graylog event definition.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "graylog_event_definition" "example" {
  id = "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the event definition. Either `id` or `title` must be provided.
- `title` (String) The title of the event definition. Either `id` or `title` must be provided.

### Read-Only

- `alert` (Boolean) Whether this event definition triggers alerts.
- `description` (String) The description of the event definition.
- `matched_at` (String) The timestamp when the event definition was last matched.
- `priority` (Number) The priority level of the event definition.
- `state` (String) The state of the event definition (e.g., `ENABLED`, `DISABLED`).
- `updated_at` (String) The timestamp when the event definition was last updated.
